original_text: Even while they were in their kingdom, enjoying your great goodness to them in the spacious and fertile land you gave them, they did not serve you or turn from their evil ways.
korean_text: 그들이 그 나라와 주께서 그들에게 베푸신 큰 복과 자기 앞에 주신 넓고 기름진 땅을 누리면서도 주를 섬기지 아니하며 악행을 그치지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: Even while they were in their kingdom
enjoying your great goodness to them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 그들에게 대한 큰 선하심을 누리면서

sentences.original_text: in the spacious and fertile land
or turn from their evil ways
